means: 白肢野牛，印度野牛（产于印度、缅甸等国，是现存最大的野牛）

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from Sanskrit gaura; related to cow

means.word_mean: 1. wild ox of mountainous areas of eastern India

auth_sentence.content: Other species of wild bovines were also domesticated, namely the wild water buffalo, gaur, and banteng.
